title: Big Tech Deal: Anthropic Teams Up with Microsoft and Nvidia
summary: Anthropic, a company that makes smart AI models called Claude, has made a huge deal with Microsoft and Nvidia. They are buying $30 billion worth of cloud computing power from Microsoft's Azure service. In return, Microsoft and Nvidia are investing $15 billion in Anthropic. This means Anthropic can use powerful computers to train and run its Claude models better. Claude will be available on Microsoft's platforms for businesses, helping them use AI tools easily. The partnership helps Anthropic grow and make its AI faster and cheaper to run. It's a big step for AI technology in the cloud.

Partnerships like this help companies share resources and grow together in the tech world.
